PRODUCT_SECTION.TITLE: AutoCut
PRODUCT_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: It is an innovative platform designed to transform the way automotive content creators produce, edit, publish, and analyze their content, bringing together AI-powered tools in one unified space.

FEATURES_SECTION.TITLE: Features
FEATURES_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: AutoCut offers a unified platform that integrates key tools such as AI-based car recognition, automatic clip evaluation, and social media content optimization. This allows content creators to improve productivity, reduce costs, and increase the reach of their posts — all in one place.

LIST.AUTHOR: Javier Cruz
LIST.TEXT: AutoCut has revolutionized my content creation process. Now everything I need is in one platform, and the AI makes everything much faster!

LIST.AUTHOR: María González
LIST.TEXT: Thanks to AutoCut, I’ve optimized my posts and increased my reach on social media without juggling multiple tools.

LIST.AUTHOR: Carlos Rodríguez
LIST.TEXT: The AI integration in AutoCut has allowed me to create higher-quality content in less time. It’s the perfect solution for automotive content creators!
